name: R+fence.w.w+po-addrs
inits: BEnv (K NONE)⦇"MEM8" ↦ SOME (BVal_Mem Bit64 Bit8 FEMPTY)⦈

BEnv (K NONE)⦇"x7" ↦ SOME (BVal_Imm (Imm64 y)); "x6" ↦ SOME (BVal_Imm (Imm64 x)); "x5" ↦ SOME (BVal_Imm (Imm64 1w)); "x11" ↦ SOME (BVal_Imm (Imm64 0w)); "x9" ↦ SOME (BVal_Imm (Imm64 0w)); "x8" ↦ SOME (BVal_Imm (Imm64 0w)); "x10" ↦ SOME (BVal_Imm (Imm64 0w))⦈
BEnv (K NONE)⦇"x8" ↦ SOME (BVal_Imm (Imm64 x)); "x6" ↦ SOME (BVal_Imm (Imm64 y)); "x5" ↦ SOME (BVal_Imm (Imm64 2w))⦈
progs: BirProgram [<|bb_label := BL_Address_HC (Imm64 0w) "00532023 (sw t0,0(t1))"; bb_atomic := F; bb_statements := [BStmt_Assert (BExp_Aligned Bit64 2 (BExp_Den (BVar "x6" (BType_Imm Bit64)))); BStmt_Assert (BExp_unchanged_mem_interval_distinct Bit64 0 1000 (BExp_Den (BVar "x6" (BType_Imm Bit64))) 4); BStmt_Assign (BVar "MEM8" (BType_Mem Bit64 Bit8)) (BExp_Store (BExp_Den (BVar "MEM8" (BType_Mem Bit64 Bit8))) (BExp_Den (BVar "x6" (BType_Imm Bit64))) BEnd_LittleEndian (BExp_Cast BIExp_LowCast (BExp_Den (BVar "x5" (BType_Imm Bit64))) Bit32))]; bb_last_statement := BStmt_Jmp (BLE_Label (BL_Address (Imm64 4w)))|>; <|bb_label := BL_Address_HC (Imm64 4w) "0110000F"; bb_atomic := T; bb_statements := [BStmt_Fence BM_Write BM_Write]; bb_last_statement := BStmt_Jmp (BLE_Label (BL_Address (Imm64 8w)))|>; <|bb_label := BL_Address_HC (Imm64 8w) "0053A023 (sw t0,0(t2))"; bb_atomic := F; bb_statements := [BStmt_Assert (BExp_Aligned Bit64 2 (BExp_Den (BVar "x7" (BType_Imm Bit64)))); BStmt_Assert (BExp_unchanged_mem_interval_distinct Bit64 0 1000 (BExp_Den (BVar "x7" (BType_Imm Bit64))) 4); BStmt_Assign (BVar "MEM8" (BType_Mem Bit64 Bit8)) (BExp_Store (BExp_Den (BVar "MEM8" (BType_Mem Bit64 Bit8))) (BExp_Den (BVar "x7" (BType_Imm Bit64))) BEnd_LittleEndian (BExp_Cast BIExp_LowCast (BExp_Den (BVar "x5" (BType_Imm Bit64))) Bit32))]; bb_last_statement := BStmt_Jmp (BLE_Label (BL_Address (Imm64 12w)))|>; <|bb_label := BL_Address_HC (Imm64 12w) "009405B3 (add a1,s0,s1)"; bb_atomic := F; bb_statements := [BStmt_Assign (BVar "x11" (BType_Imm Bit64)) (BExp_BinExp BIExp_Plus (BExp_Den (BVar "x9" (BType_Imm Bit64))) (BExp_Den (BVar "x8" (BType_Imm Bit64))))]; bb_last_statement := BStmt_Jmp (BLE_Label (BL_Address (Imm64 16w)))|>; <|bb_label := BL_Address_HC (Imm64 16w) "0005A503 (lw a0,0(a1))"; bb_atomic := F; bb_statements := [BStmt_Assert (BExp_Aligned Bit64 2 (BExp_Den (BVar "x11" (BType_Imm Bit64)))); BStmt_Assign (BVar "x10" (BType_Imm Bit64)) (BExp_Cast BIExp_SignedCast (BExp_Load (BExp_Den (BVar "MEM8" (BType_Mem Bit64 Bit8))) (BExp_Den (BVar "x11" (BType_Imm Bit64))) BEnd_LittleEndian Bit32) Bit64)]; bb_last_statement := BStmt_Jmp (BLE_Label (BL_Address (Imm64 20w)))|>; <|bb_label := BL_Address_HC (Imm64 20w) "00000013 (nop)"; bb_atomic := F; bb_statements := []; bb_last_statement := BStmt_Halt (BExp_Const (Imm32 0w))|>]
final: λss. ∃(mem,thds). (mem,thds) ∈ ss ⇒ (∀fmap. bir_env_lookup "MEM8" mem = SOME (BVal_Mem Bit64 Bit8 fmap) ⇒ FLOOKUP fmap (w2n y) = SOME 2) ∧ bir_env_lookup "x10" (EL 1 thds) = SOME (BVal_Imm (Imm64 0w))
